TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PipeStream extends System.IO.Stream
Public MustInherit Class PipeStream Inherits Stream
public ref class PipeStream abstract : System::IO::Stream

Docs.summary: Exposes a object around a pipe, which supports both anonymous and named pipes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream>類別提供基底類別的.NET Framework 中的具名和匿名管道作業。 使用<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>和<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>具名的管道作業的類別。 使用<xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>和<xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream>匿名管道作業的類別。
如需有關管道的詳細資訊，請參閱[管道](~/docs/standard/io/pipe-operations.md)。 如需匿名管道的範例，請參閱 <<c0> [ 如何： 使用匿名管道進行本機處理序間通訊](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-anonymous-pipes-for-local-interprocess-communication.md)。 如需具名管道的範例，請參閱 <<c0> [ 如何： 使用具名管道進行網路處理序間通訊](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md)。

Docs.permission: 針對繼承者完全信任。 這個類別無法繼承由部分信任的程式碼。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override IAsyncResult BeginRead (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginRead(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Overrides Function BeginRead (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: override IAsyncResult ^ BeginRead(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);
override this.BeginRead : byte[] * int * int * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

Docs.param: The buffer to read data into.
The byte offset in buffer at which to begin reading.
The maximum number of bytes to read.
The method to call when the asynchronous read operation is completed.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read request from other requests.
Docs.summary: Begins an asynchronous read operation.
Docs.returns: An object that references the asynchronous read.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 傳回傳遞<xref:System.IAsyncResult>物件至<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.EndRead%2A>方法來判斷多少位元組被讀取，並釋放用於讀取的作業系統資源。 <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.EndRead%2A> 必須針對每次呼叫一次呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginRead%2A>。 這可以在相同的程式碼呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginRead%2A>或在傳遞至回呼<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginRead%2A>。
使用<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.CanRead%2A>屬性來判斷是否目前<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream>物件支援讀取作業。
如果管道已關閉或無效的引數傳遞至<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginRead%2A>，會立即引發適當的例外狀況。 執行要求的執行緒集區執行緒上，就會發生在非同步讀取要求期間發生的錯誤。 程式碼呼叫時，會引發例外狀況<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.EndRead%2A>方法。

Docs.exception: is .
is less than 0. -or- is less than 0.
is greater than the number of bytes available in .
The pipe is closed.
The pipe does not support read operations.
The pipe is disconnected, waiting to connect, or the handle has not been set.
The pipe is broken or another I/O error occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public override IAsyncResult BeginWrite (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginWrite(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Overrides Function BeginWrite (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: override IAsyncResult ^ BeginWrite(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);
override this.BeginWrite : byte[] * int * int * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

Docs.param: The buffer that contains the data to write to the current stream.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to write.
The method to call when the asynchronous write operation is completed.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous write request from other requests.
Docs.summary: Begins an asynchronous write operation.
Docs.returns: An object that references the asynchronous write operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.EndWrite%2A> 必須針對每次呼叫一次呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginWrite%2A>。 這可以在相同的程式碼呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginWrite%2A>或在傳遞至回呼<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginWrite%2A>。
使用<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.CanWrite%2A>屬性來判斷是否目前<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream>物件支援寫入作業。
如果管道已關閉或無效的引數傳遞至<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginWrite%2A>，會立即引發適當的例外狀況。 執行要求的執行緒集區執行緒上，會發生在非同步寫入要求期間發生的錯誤。 程式碼呼叫時，會引發例外狀況<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.EndWrite%2A>方法。

Docs.exception: is .
is less than 0. -or- is less than 0.
is greater than the number of bytes available in .
The pipe is closed.
The pipe does not support write operations.
The pipe is disconnected, waiting to connect, or the handle has not been set.
The pipe is broken or another I/O error occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);
override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> 叫用受保護<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.Dispose%2A>方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.Dispose%2A>具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 當處置參數是`true`，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream>物件參考。 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.Dispose%2A> 方法。

block.para: 在衍生類別，讓所有中的清除邏輯方法。 可以由其他物件呼叫多次。覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊和，請參閱 [總未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 清除。

MemberSignature.Value: public override int EndRead (IAsyncResult asyncResult);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 EndRead(class System.IAsyncResult asyncResult) cil managed
Public Overrides Function EndRead (asyncResult As IAsyncResult) As Integer
public: override int EndRead(IAsyncResult ^ asyncResult);
override this.EndRead : IAsyncResult -> int

Docs.param: The reference to the pending asynchronous request.
Docs.summary: Ends a pending asynchronous read request.
Docs.returns: The number of bytes that were read. A return value of 0 indicates the end of the stream (the pipe has been closed).

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法返回先前調用<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginRead%2A>所指定的字節數組中讀取的字節數。
傳回傳遞<xref:System.IAsyncResult>物件至<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.EndRead%2A>方法來判斷多少位元組被讀取，並釋放用於讀取的作業系統資源。 <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.EndRead%2A> 必須針對每次呼叫一次呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginRead%2A>。 這可以在相同的程式碼呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginRead%2A>或在傳遞至回呼<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginRead%2A>。
使用<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.CanRead%2A>屬性來判斷是否目前<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream>物件支援讀取作業。
如果管道已關閉或無效的引數傳遞至<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginRead%2A>，會立即引發適當的例外狀況。 執行要求的執行緒集區執行緒上，就會發生在非同步讀取要求期間發生的錯誤。 程式碼呼叫時，會引發例外狀況<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.EndRead%2A>方法。

Docs.exception: is .
did not originate from a method on the current stream.
The stream is closed or an internal error has occurred.

使用<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.CanWrite%2A>屬性來判斷是否目前<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream>物件支援寫入作業。
如果管道已關閉或無效的引數傳遞至<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginWrite%2A>，會立即引發適當的例外狀況。 執行要求的執行緒集區執行緒上，會發生在非同步寫入要求期間發生的錯誤。 會引發例外狀況時的程式碼呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.EndWrite%2A>方法。

Docs.exception: is .
did not originate from a method on the current stream.
The stream is closed or an internal error has occurred.

The pipe does not support write operations.

Docs.exception: The pipe is closed.

The underlying call to set security information failed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read([in]unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer) As Integer
public: override int Read(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);
override this.Read : byte[] * int * int -> int

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The byte offset in the buffer array at which the bytes that are read will be placed.
The maximum number of bytes to read.
Docs.summary: Reads a block of bytes from a stream and writes the data to a specified buffer.
Docs.returns: The total number of bytes that are read into . This might be less than the number of bytes requested if that number of bytes is not currently available, or 0 if the end of the stream is reached.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.CanRead%2A>屬性來判斷是否目前<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream>物件支援讀取作業。
呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.Read%2A>方法會封鎖直到`count`會讀取的位元組或資料流結尾為止。 非同步讀取作業，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginRead%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.EndRead%2A>。
## Examples 下列範例會建立匿名管道用戶端和管道伺服器。 管道伺服器使用<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.Read%2A>方法來讀取管道用戶端，做為驗證程式碼中的一系列的位元組。 管道用戶端和管道伺服器屬於相同的範例。 此範例的伺服器部分會建立用戶端處理序，並將它做為引數傳遞匿名管道控制代碼。
[!code-cpp[System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.pipes.pipestream/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.pipes.pipestream/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.pipes.pipestream/vb/sample.vb#1)]

呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.Write%2A>方法會封鎖直到`count`會讀取的位元組或資料流結尾為止。 非同步讀取作業，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.BeginWrite%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.EndWrite%2A>。
